OUTLINE : Patients receive vinorelbine IV 6-10 minute weekly week 1-6 . Treatment repeat every 8 week total 10 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients follow every 4 month 2 year , every 6 month 1 year , annually thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A maximum 100 patient accrue study within 2 year .
